title: Establishing a Joint UK-South America Partnership in Industrial Biotechnology and Bioenergy
impactText: This meeting helped establish a working group of researchers in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, UK, Netherlands and Sweden, who work together to anticipate research calls in the industrial biotechnology and bioenergy sector to do with plant biomass. This is leading to a range of grant proposals for collaborations in this area. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Manufacturing, including Industrial Biotechology
